data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during Princes Maria Louisa cruise from Texel to St. Eustatius started at 1777-12-25
Ship: Princes Maria Louisa, Voyage: Texel - St Eustatius, 1st Observer: W. Van Der Beets (Kapitein), Company: ADM, Other ship information: SCHEEPS DIEPGANG ACHTER 16 VOET. VOOR 14 VOET. 137 KOPPEN
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
